title: DSA Level 9 â€” Graphs & Traversals
intro: This level introduces graphs and standard traversal techniques.
points: Understand what graphs are and how they are represented (adjacency list/matrix).
Know the difference between directed and undirected graphs.
Implement or understand Depth First Search (DFS).
Implement or understand Breadth First Search (BFS).
Relate graph problems (paths, connectivity) to DFS and BFS.
